sen.e: Tomomitsu was from the family of lower-ranking government officials serving Kurododokoro (the Chamberlain's Office) for generations, and called himself as the Iga clan since his appointment to Iga no kuni kokushi (governor of Iga Province).

sen.e: Since his adopted son-in-law Yoshitoki HOJO became the second Shikken (shogunal regent) of the Kamakura Shogunate, Tomomitsu's children were active as Yoshitoki's maternal relatives.
